AddOrganizationNode.document: This API is used to add an organization node.
AddOrganizationNode.name: Adds an organization node

BindOrganizationMemberAuthAccount.document: This API is used to bind an organization member to a sub-account of the organization admin.
BindOrganizationMemberAuthAccount.name: Binds an organization member to a sub-account of the organization admin

CancelOrganizationMemberAuthAccount.document: This API is used to unbind an organization member from a sub-account of the organization admin.
CancelOrganizationMemberAuthAccount.name: Unbinds an organization member from a sub-account of the organization admin

CreateOrganizationMember.document: This API is used to create an organization member.
CreateOrganizationMember.name: Creates an organization member

CreateOrganizationMemberPolicy.document: This API is used to create an organization member access policy.
CreateOrganizationMemberPolicy.name: Creates an organization member access policy

DeleteOrganizationMembers.document: This API is used to batch delete organization members.
DeleteOrganizationMembers.name: Batch deletes organization members

DeleteOrganizationNodes.document: This API is used to batch delete organization nodes.
DeleteOrganizationNodes.name: Batch deletes organization nodes

DescribeOrganization.document: This API is used to get the organization information.
DescribeOrganization.name: Gets the organization information

DescribeOrganizationMemberAuthAccounts.document: This API is used to get the list of sub-accounts bound to an organization member.
DescribeOrganizationMemberAuthAccounts.name: Gets the list of sub-accounts bound to an organization member

DescribeOrganizationMemberAuthIdentities.document: This API is used to get the list of manageable identities of an organization member.
DescribeOrganizationMemberAuthIdentities.name: Gets the list of manageable identities of an organization member

DescribeOrganizationMemberPolicies.document: This API is used to get the list of authorization policies of an organization member.
DescribeOrganizationMemberPolicies.name: Gets the list of authorization policies of an organization member

DescribeOrganizationMembers.document: This API is used to get the list of organization members.
DescribeOrganizationMembers.name: Gets the list of organization members

DescribeOrganizationNodes.document: This API is used to get the list of organization nodes.
DescribeOrganizationNodes.name: Gets the list of organization nodes

ListOrganizationIdentity.document: This API is used to get the list of access identities of an organization member.
ListOrganizationIdentity.name: Gets the list of access identities of an organization member

MoveOrganizationNodeMembers.document: This API is used to move a member to the specified organization node.
MoveOrganizationNodeMembers.name: Moves a member to the specified organization node

UpdateOrganizationNode.document: This API is used to update an organization node.
UpdateOrganizationNode.name: Updates an organization node
